entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
